name: IronMan - The Game
description:
You're IronMan, the Iron!

 SteamJump to the end of the levels, but don't forget to collect all the buttons, they are gonna be VERY useful!

- Play through the 5 (for now!!) levels, trying to reach the end without running out of steam!

- Death is not the end, but it's still very frustrating! On every death, you lose the steam you used!

- Learn how to beat the levels in the "TRAIN" mode!
